metadata.description: Internal Treasure Data skills for Claude Code to enhance productivity with TD-specific tools and workflows

plugins.name: sql-skills
plugins.description: SQL query skills for Treasure Data including Trino and Hive query optimization, time-based filtering with td_interval, and Trino-to-Hive migration

plugins.name: realtime-skills
plugins.description: RT 2.0 (Real-Time Personalization) skills for configuring parent segments with event tables and RT attributes, creating personalization services for real-time API responses, managing real-time journeys with event-triggered activations, and querying activation/identity logs. Includes end-to-end orchestrator skills for complete RT setup workflows and validation tools for error-free personalization entity creation.

plugins.name: field-agent-skills
plugins.description: Field Agent development and production best practices including deployment workflows, documentation standards, and professional Plotly visualization guidelines for creating executive-ready agents

plugins.name: semantic-layer
plugins.description: Semantic layer skills for data governance and catalog management including data dictionary helper for asset documentation and schema auto-tagger for automated policy-based tagging with intelligent pattern detection and compliance support

plugins.name: workflow-skills
plugins.description: Treasure Workflow orchestration and data transformation skills including workflow creation, management, debugging, optimization, and dbt (data build tool) for Treasure Data Trino

plugins.name: sdk-skills
plugins.description: Skills for using Treasure Data SDKs including JavaScript SDK for browser-based event tracking and pytd (Python SDK) for querying data, importing pandas DataFrames, and building analytical pipelines

plugins.name: tdx-skills
plugins.description: tdx CLI for managing Treasure Data from the command line including database management, table operations, queries, context configuration, CDP parent segments, child segments with activations, segment validation, journey orchestration, and workflow management

plugins.name: template-skill
plugins.description: Template for creating new TD-specific Claude Code skills with best practices and standard structure

plugins.name: aps-doc-skills
plugins.description: Modular technical documentation generation for Treasure Data pipeline layers and CDP. Layer-specific expert skills for core patterns, ingestion, staging, hist-union, ID unification, golden layers, and CDP master segment configurations with intelligent auto-detection and comprehensive documentation.

plugins.name: email-campaign-skills
plugins.description: Generate enterprise-grade HTML email campaigns with strategy briefs, live preview in Treasure Studio, iterative natural language editing, and push to Treasure Engage
